notes.note:
To further protect your privacy, our new [default HTTP Referrer policy][0] will trim path and query string information from referrer headers to prevent sites from accidentally leaking sensitive user data.

[0]: https://blog.mozilla.org/security/2021/03/22/firefox-87-trims-http-referrers-by-default-to-protect-user-privacy/
Sharing an image now shares the image itself instead of its URL
Sites that have only been visited once are no longer automatically added as Top Sites on the home screen.
WebRender is rolling out to more devices, with the following mobile GPUs now supported: Adreno 505, Adreno 506, Mali-T.

text:
We'd like to extend a special thank you to [all of the new Mozillians][0] who contributed to this release of Firefox!

[0]: https://blog.mozilla.org/community/2021/03/22/contributors-to-firefox-87
title: Firefox for Android 87.0 Release
